title: Scary Spaces: Ambient Horror Music Loops
description: Whether you're crafting a survival horror or a spine-chilling experience, "Scary Spaces" sets the perfect mood for your game.
longDescription:
Immerse yourself in the spine-chilling realms of horror with "Scary Spaces: Ambient Horror Music Loops," a meticulously crafted collection featuring 10 original tracks designed to send shivers down your spine. These loopable compositions are perfect for creating an immersive and suspenseful atmosphere in your horror-themed video games.


Listen to the Demo here.


Tracklist:

  1. Demonic Echoes Loop
  2. Unearthly Desolation Loop
  3. Creeping Shadows of Doom Loop
  4. Sinister Nightfall Loop
  5. Cursed Cryptic Enigma Loop
  6. The Scream of Forgotten Souls Loop
  7. Petrifying Nightmares Loop
  8. Rituals in the Void Loop
  9. Phantom Whispers Loop
  10. Abandoned Asylum Loop


I value your feedback:

Your thoughts matter! Whether it's a review, suggestions, or direct contact, I appreciate your input. Interact with me and let's shape the fear together.


Contact:

For custom requests or further queries, feel free to reach out via email: hello@markthechef.net or check my socials on Instagram.


Dare to let "Scary Spaces: Ambient Horror Music Loops" be the soundtrack to your terrifying adventures.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • 10 Original Loopable Compositions
  • Ideal for Horror or Survival Games

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 18:28
